Bash(git -C C:/apps/student-portal commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor from Quiz-centric to Course>Chapter hierarchy with MA Curriculum integration

Replace the flat Quiz model with a Course > Chapter data hierarchy that mirrors
how school content is actually organized. Add MA Mathematics Curriculum Framework
standards alignment and AI-powered content augmentation.

Key changes:
- Schema: Quiz model replaced with Course + Chapter models \(grade, level, subject\)
- Materials now link to chapters with materialType classification
- AI prompts parameterized by grade/level/course instead of hardcoded "10th grader"
- New curriculum module with MA standards data and AI-based standards matching
- Content augmentation: supplementary content, gap analysis, vocabulary, formulas
- Full UI overhaul: course/chapter CRUD pages, standards selector, augmentation viewer
- ~27 new files, ~12 deleted, ~22 modified

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
